```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
#Load packages
library(shiny)
library(shinythemes)
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
library(data.table)
library(DT)
library(ggpubr)
library(cowplot)
library(plotly)
library(tidyverse)

## Load data ##
#Note this code could be adapted for use with the RAD8 (Durridge) and LI7820 N2O Analyzer

## Specifications ##

TIMEZONE = "EST" #Used across all

## EXO DATA ##

#Set exo column names
exo_names <- c("TIMESTAMP","RECORD","Date","Time","Chlorophyll_RFU","Chlorophyll_ugL",
              "Conductivity","FDOM_QSU","FDOM_RFU","NLF_conductivity",
              "ODO_sat","ODO_local", "ODO_MgL", "Pressure_psia", "Salinity_PPT", 
              "Specific_Conductivity_uScm", "BGA_PE_RFU", "BGA_PE_ugL",
              "TDS_mg_L","Turbidity_FNU","Wiper_Position_mv","pH","pH_mv","Temp_C", 
              "Depth_m","Battery_v","Cable_v","Wiper_Current_ma","sn","snn")

#Read in current water quality sonde (EXO2) data from SARGE
exo <- read_delim("Example_Data/WILSON_ExoTable.dat", 
                  skip=4, delim= ",", show_col_types = F, col_names = exo_names) %>%
  mutate(TIMESTAMP = format(TIMESTAMP, "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S"), #Remove posix formatting
         TIMESTAMP = ymd_hms(TIMESTAMP, tz = TIMEZONE)) #Add timezone

## SONTEK DATA ##

#read in hydrologic data from Sontek IQ (Xylem Analytics)
sontek_names <- read_delim(
  "Example_Data/WILSON_SontekTable.dat",
  delim = ",", skip = 1, n_max = 1, # read only the row with column names
  show_col_types = F
)

sontek <- read_delim(
  "Example_Data/WILSON_SontekTable.dat",
  delim = ",", skip = 4,
  col_names = colnames(sontek_names), # identified above
  show_col_types = FALSE) %>%
  mutate(TIMESTAMP = format(TIMESTAMP, "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S"), #Remove posix formatting
         TIMESTAMP = ymd_hms(TIMESTAMP, tz = TIMEZONE)) #Add timezone

## FLUX DATA ##

#read in gas concentration data from the LI7810 (LI-COR)
flux_names <- read_delim(
  "Example_Data/WILSON_FLUX_7810.dat",
  delim = ",", skip = 1, n_max = 1, # read only the row with column names
  show_col_types = F
)

flux <- read_delim(
  "Example_Data/WILSON_FLUX_7810.dat",
  delim = ",", skip = 4,
  col_names = colnames(flux_names), # identified above
  show_col_types = FALSE) %>%
  mutate(TIMESTAMP = format(TIMESTAMP, "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S"), #Remove posix formatting
         TIMESTAMP = ymd_hms(TIMESTAMP, tz = TIMEZONE)) %>% #Add timezone
  rename(CH4d_ppm = CH4,
         CO2d_ppm = CO2)

## RADON DATA ##

#read in radon concentration data from the RAD7 (Durridge)
radon_names <- read_delim(
  "Example_Data/WILSON_Rad7Table.dat",
  delim = ",", skip = 1, n_max = 1, # read only the row with column names
  show_col_types = F
)

radon <- read_delim(
  "Example_Data/WILSON_Rad7Table.dat",
  delim = ",", skip = 4,
  col_names = colnames(radon_names), # identified above
  show_col_types = FALSE) %>%
  mutate(TIMESTAMP = format(TIMESTAMP, "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S"), #Remove posix formatting
         TIMESTAMP = ymd_hms(TIMESTAMP, tz = TIMEZONE)) #Add timezone

## FOR TESTING
input <- list()
input$start_date <- as.POSIXct('2024-09-19 00:00:00', format = "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S")
input$end_date <- as.POSIXct('2024-09-28 00:00:00', format = "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S")
input$exo_vars <- c("Depth_m")
input$rad_vars <- c("Radon_concentration_Rad7", "RH_sample_Rad7")

#Set min and max for date input
min_date <- min(c(exo$TIMESTAMP,
                  sontek$TIMESTAMP,
                  flux$TIMESTAMP,
                  radon$TIMESTAMP), 
                na.rm = T)

max_date <- max(c(exo$TIMESTAMP,
                  sontek$TIMESTAMP,
                  flux$TIMESTAMP,
                  radon$TIMESTAMP), 
                na.rm = T)
```

```{r}
#| panel: input
#| layout-ncol: 2

dateInput('start_date', 'Start date', 
          min = min_date, 
          max = max_date,
          value = "2024-09-19")

dateInput('end_date', 'End date', 
          min = min_date, 
          max = max_date,
          value = "2024-09-27")
```

```{r}
#| context: server

#Code for plots
output$plot_exo <- renderPlotly({
  exo_recent <- exo %>%
    filter(as.Date(TIMESTAMP) >= input$start_date,
           as.Date(TIMESTAMP) <= input$end_date) %>%
    select(TIMESTAMP, all_of(input$exo_vars)) %>%
    pivot_longer(input$exo_vars) 
  
  p1 <- exo_recent %>%
    ggplot(aes(x=TIMESTAMP, y=value)) + 
    geom_point(size = 0.3)+
    theme_classic()+
    facet_wrap(~name, scales = "free_y")+
    theme(axis.title.x = element_blank())
  
  plotly::ggplotly(p1, tooltip=c("TIMESTAMP", "value"))
})

output$plot_sontek <- renderPlotly({
  sontek_recent <- sontek %>%
    filter(as.Date(TIMESTAMP) >= input$start_date,
           as.Date(TIMESTAMP) <= input$end_date) %>%
    select(TIMESTAMP, all_of(input$sontek_vars)) %>%

    facet_wrap(~name, scales = "free_y")+
    theme(axis.title.x = element_blank())
  
  plotly::ggplotly(p1, tooltip=c("TIMESTAMP", "value"))
})

output$plot_flux <- renderPlotly({
  flux_recent <- flux %>%

  plotly::ggplotly(p1, tooltip=c("TIMESTAMP", "value"))
})

output$plot_radon <- renderPlotly({
  rad_recent <- radon %>%
    filter(as.Date(TIMESTAMP) >= input$start_date,

    select(TIMESTAMP, all_of(input$rad_vars)) %>%
    pivot_longer(input$rad_vars) 
  
  p1 <- rad_recent %>%
    ggplot(aes(x=TIMESTAMP, y=value)) + 
    geom_point(size = 0.3)+
    theme_classic()+
    facet_wrap(~name, scales = "free_y")+
    theme(axis.title.x = element_blank())
  
  plotly::ggplotly(p1, tooltip=c("TIMESTAMP", "value"))
})

#Code for data tables
output$table_exo <- DT::renderDataTable({exo %>%
    arrange(rev(TIMESTAMP))},
    rownames = F,
    class = "display nowrap")
output$table_sontek <- DT::renderDataTable({sontek %>%
    arrange(rev(TIMESTAMP))},
    rownames = F,
    class = "display nowrap")
output$table_radon <- DT::renderDataTable({radon %>%
    arrange(rev(TIMESTAMP))},
    rownames = F,
    class = "display nowrap")
output$table_flux <- DT::renderDataTable({flux %>%
    arrange(rev(TIMESTAMP))},
    rownames = F,
    class = "display nowrap")

#Max timesteps for overview page
output$data_latest <- renderText({
  formatted_date_flux <- paste(format(max(flux$TIMESTAMP, na.rm = T), 
                                 "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S"), 
                          TIMEZONE)
  formatted_date_exo <- paste(format(max(exo$TIMESTAMP, na.rm = T), 
                                 "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S"), 
                          TIMEZONE)
  formatted_date_rad <- paste(format(max(radon$TIMESTAMP, na.rm = T), 
                                 "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S"), 
                          TIMEZONE)
  formatted_date_sontek <- paste(format(max(sontek$TIMESTAMP, na.rm = T), 
                                 "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S"), 
                          TIMEZONE)
  formatted_list <- paste(
    "<ul><li><b>Exo:</b> ", formatted_date_exo, "</li>
    <li><b>Sontek:</b> ", formatted_date_sontek, "</li>
    <li><b>Flux:</b> ", formatted_date_flux, "</li>
    <li><b>Radon:</b> ", formatted_date_rad, "</li></ul>")
  
  return(formatted_list)
  })
```
